description.value:
Starting at 1st level, you learn additional spells when you reach certain levels in this class, as shown on the Psionic Spells table. Each of these spells counts as a sorcerer spell for you, but it doesn't count against the number of sorcerer spells you know.

Whenever you gain a sorcerer level, you can replace one spell you gained from this feature with another spell of the same level. The new spell must be a divination or an enchantment spell from the sorcerer, warlock, or wizard spell list.

Sorcerer Level Spells
1st @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.CyHSyVvBJnF45iBc]{Arms of Hadar}, @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.7rEqqY2eemDsBm9X]{Dissonant Whispers}, @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.9CqV3yMyYhYXrbcs]{Mind Sliver}
3rd @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.FITDsvKW3cQZt4t3]{Calm Emotions}, @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.hxm9hkIKezjpPS1u]{Detect Thoughts}
5th @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.9QIqQoaCHIhURD6m]{Hunger Of Hadar}, @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.YNWtSVuh1XA1tb37]{Sending}
7th @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.StNXJMU3vcM9fKrA]{Evard's Black Tentacles}, @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.RZJ0xJZajeNZ8QSw]{Summon Aberration}
9th @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.lAA07kWQ3Xep9WZJ]{Rary's Telepathic Bond}, @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.D0sbCMCf3owY3zcP]{Telekinesis}

Note: When you add these spells to your character, set Preparation Mode to Always Prepared.

magicitems.destroyFlavorText: reaches 0 charges: it crumbles into ashes and is destroyed.
